parameters.query:
SELECT 
    vo.*,
    ld.phone,
    cl.*,
    ld.first_name,
    ml.*,
    ld.education_qualification
FROM 
    visit_office AS vo
LEFT JOIN 
    leads_dump AS ld ON ld.id = vo.leads_dump_id
LEFT JOIN 
    course_list AS cl ON cl.id = ld.course
LEFT JOIN 
    miles_locations AS ml ON ml.location_name = vo.city
WHERE 
    vo.time_slots BETWEEN '{{$input.item.json.firstDate}}' AND '{{$input.item.json.secondDate}}'
    AND ld.phone LIKE '%623813329%';

string.name: message
string.value:
=Hey {{ $('IF5').item.json.first_name }},

We're looking forward to your timely arrival at *{ $('IF5').item.json.time_string }}*.

📲 For any assistance, feel free to reach out to {{ $('IF5').item.json.sopc_name ?? " " }}  at {{ $('IF5').item.json.spoc_phone ?? " " }} . 

🙌 Wish you all the best for your meeting! CTA: Miles Office Location

json.name: CPA

wa_content.hero: *80% CPAs in India are Miles Alumni*
wa_content.content: We're glad you're interested in the US CPA program! We know you'll have a lot of questions about how you can work in the Big 4 and top MNCs in India.

1. CPA has only *4 exams* which you pass in the next *18 months* 
2. As a Miles CPA alumni, you have *assured jobs with Big 4/MNCs in India* (or with firms in the US if you _opt for the Miles US pathway_)
3. _#CPAmatlabMiles_ - *80%+ CPAs in India are Miles alumni*

◾️ Know more about CPA = 4 exams, 18 months timeline 
◾️ Know about CPA job opportunities in India as well as US
◾️ Know if you are eligible for CPA
◾️ Understand why everyone says #CPAmatlabMiles
◾️ Discuss any queries you have
working in the Big 4 and top MNCs in India.
to working in the Big 4 and top MNCs in India.

wa_content.hero: You expressed an interest in the *CPA Program* but haven't booked your Miles office visit yet!
wa_content.content:
Your visit is crucial to start your journey to earn your CPA and work at Big 4 and top MNCs. You get to: 
◾️ Understand the CPA Program (4 exams) 
◾️ Check Your Eligibility 
◾️ Meet the Expert

wa_content.content2: This is the first step to working at the *Big 4 and top MNCs.*

json.address: 911/912, Wing A, Kanakia Wall Street, Andheri Kurla Road, Mumbai - 400093
